Считающий, что был убит более десяти лет назад, Призрак - человек, стремящийся искупить свое бесчестное имя, служа личным убийцей своего хозяина. Годы бессердечной резни превратили его в жестокого и умелого убийцу. Используя сложное оружие, сделанное, чтобы противостоять его наиболее распространенным целям, призрак заманивает своих жертв в тугие цепи, прежде чем нанести смертельный удар лезвием своего злого инструмента.

Призрак путешествует во многие отдаленные места, чтобы выполнить ужасное задание, данное ему хозяином. В результате он жертвует более тяжелой броней, обычно носимой воинами его страны, в пользу более легкой одежды, которая также позволяет ему свободно передвигаться, чтобы использовать свое смертоносное оружие. Лезвие и цепь, которыми он владеет, используются с пугающим мастерством. Он может бросить лезвие в сторону, чтобы разорвать и казнить своих жертв, или использовать тупую сторону как цеп, чтобы вывести из строя своих врагов.

Устрашающий убийца без эмоций, Призрак, научился быть наиболее эффективным в темноте. Он жутко молчалив, несмотря на свое телосложение, и использует это в своих интересах. Он может наносить невидимые удары из тени, побеждая даже существ, живущих там.
A worthless kill. It does not lessen the price I must pay.
I will die a second time, and it will be as pathetic as my first death!
I have not paid my full due! I will die forgotten!
I have collected a decade's worth of souls, yet it will all be for nothing!
I have traded hundreds of lives for my own, but it will not save me in this moment!
Have the Shoguns sent you?! Have they broken their deal?!
You seek to end me? I will not allow such when I am so close to redemption!
Hmph. Spineless assassins, sent to ensure I never finish my deed.
Betrayal is afoot. I will not be fooled again.
Come to claim the bounty on my head? It will be your last mistake.
I was stabbed through the heart, and it was the best thing I had ever felt.
These chains wrap tightly around me. It is pleasing.
I am always in agony, and I have learned to find solace in it.
Where there is pain, there can be pleasure.
In the anguish of my punctured heart, I have found peace.
Insufferable. You have not been trained properly for this task.
You let emotion drive your actions. You are undisciplined, unskilled.
You are all disappointments. Glimmers of potential, snuffed out by incompetence.
You have no pride, no honor. You follow the same damned path as I do.
I have fallen from grace, and now I must sulk in the dark with these wretches.
I will offer the heads of men, women, and children to redeem my name.
The life of these peasants to restore my glory? I would accept without hesitation.
I failed because I cared for another. That will not happen again.
I am uncaring, distanced, remorseless.
I have been given a task, and I will complete it no matter the sacrifice.
Even after a decade of unfeeling slaughter, I still yearn for his touch...
I had become too attached, and it twisted me into the monster I am now...
My students...I was weak, and I failed them all...
Behind this grim visage, a broken man...
My heart, it still aches for the love I thought I shared...
I am the reaper. I am the jailor. I AM DEATH!
I have died once already! I am a vengeful revenant on the hunt for blood!
Is this the afterlife? If so, it is rather droll.
I am an unholy creature, a demon walking the earth!
I am the Aspect of Death! All will fall to my blade!
Combat is an art, and I have mastered it to the fullest.
My name will be remembered. My past mistakes will be erased!
Hmph, I have seen worse.
I have killed many men, all of which were far more fearsome than this rabble.
I am close to paying my debt in full. I cannot fail now.
My name will be redeemed. I will be remembered as an honorable warrior.
I am a monster of a man. These beasts will know fear.
I do not flinch in the face of terror. I do not hesitate to kill.
I have survived a fatal blow in the past. What more could possibly stop me.
Only when my past sins have been cleansed will I finally accept my second death.
I have died once already. I have no reason to fear death again.
My younger self would struggle to face such horrors, but I am not that man.
I am fearless in the face of demonic entities. Let my courage inspire you.
A master leads through action. Let my bravery serve as your guide.
Strike with purpose. An attack is useless if it lacks conviction.
There is always a weakness. Find it and you will be the victor.
Emotions are a powerful thing. Use them to your benefit.
Know that to die with honor is a greater fate than to live in cowardice!
Hmph, I will shrug it off.
This is nothing I have not dealt with before.
We will die as cowards, forgotten in this domain of demons!
In all my years, I have never fought a foe so baleful, so malevolent!
There will be no glory in our deaths. Only torment and suffering!
You work for the Shoguns, and you have come to ensure the debt is never paid!
You seek to undermine my task! I will let no one stop me from restoring my honor!
I trusted another once, and it led to my first death. That will not happen again!
Death is so, so cold. Pain will allow me to feel warmth again!
Where a heart would be, I bear a scar instead, for pain invokes the strongest emotions!
The blade. It is a beautiful mistress that can take away the burdens of life!
I was a teacher once, but there is nothing I could teach to fools like you.
I have sacrificed my humanity to redeem my name. What have you accomplished?
You will die as I have. Shamed and forgotten.
If the Shoguns decreed it, I would offer them your lives in a heartbeat.
I have killed many innocents in my quest to preserve my honor. I do not plan to stop.
My reputation is what matters. I will be praised in my first life and feared in this one.
Even if I restore my name, the killing will burden me for the rest of my years...
I was to guide a new generation to glory, but instead I lead them to their demise...
I was praised, respected, and I foolishly threw it all away...
Innocent souls taste the best. So juicy and succulent!
This chain is wrapped around my arm twelve times. That is twice more than six!
I prefer my demonic deities over your eldritch entities.
The shadows serve as my ally. The unseen warrior is the one to live!
Flee as a coward or die as a coward, the choice is obvious!
Peril presents itself, and I must survive!
I must keep a watchful eye, lest you fiends decide to end my life abruptly!
I have dealt with rival assassins before, I will not be so easily caught!
You are honorless vermin. I will not allow you to stab me in the back!
Death was not so bad. A second death should be as painless as the first!
I know no fear. I will face these creatures head on!
An exemplary warrior would not back down in the face of such ferocity!
Demonic brethren! Let us embrace each other!
Come closer, I wish to taste your fear.
Haha! Look at how they flee before me!
Like an unholy phantom, I will vanish from sight.
Noooooooo! They bear the symbols of my anathema!
The Light is too bright! I will retreat to the shadows!
What little honor I have left, I will preserve with a selfless sacrifice...
My name is in ruins. I may as well accept my fate and be forgotten...
As who I was fades away, so too shall I...
I-I am shameful! I seek to flee from this hellscape!
I-I am a coward! I do not possess the will to complete what must be done!
T-they speak the truth! I am a lowly rat, fleeing to the safety of the shadows!
The kill belongs to me! Every life I take brings me closer to my goal!
I am a true warrior! Move aside!
I will be the one to strike the final blow!
You will face danger first, seeing as you have little to attribute to your name.
I have learned that the key to survival is to let a fool take your place!
A teacher watches his students, and you will be my student today!
The fear of failure, of my wasted efforts, it paralyzes me!
I-it happens once more! My emotions cause me to hesitate!
Memories return! Flashes of that terrible night!
He who strikes first, will surely fall for the traitor's trap.
A preemptive strike is too risky. I will wait for the rats to reveal themselves.
I am a patient man. The assassins will strike and I will steal their final breath.
A master should not have to waste his efforts.
I am getting on in years. You younger ones can take over in my place.
I have a deadened heart. Give me a moment to rest.
I have done this dreadful deed for years, and I have lost all hope to completing it...
Years later, I still hesitate to do what must be done...
I must remain still, like a lion's statue.
If I do not move, they will fail to detect me.
They will get over here. I must simply wait.
Your orders will lead me to an untimely demise. I will do what I know is best!
I will not obey someone so young and naive!
In this strange land I listen to only one master, and that is me!
Passion of a different nature takes over me!
I am a feral animal, unable to deny my basest instincts!
I am an emotional creature, and I cannot deny it!
I have performed this bloody act for two lifetimes. I know what I am doing.
Here. Witness an example of true skill.
How absurd. I must show you half-wits how to fight in the midst of live combat.
The kill is mine!
Away with you! I will have this glory and you cannot stop me!
He who lands the killing blow is the one to claim the glory!
I have lost my will! My actions are misguided!
I am lost in a daze! I have lost purpose!
I have strayed from the path. I do not know the right course of action!
RAWR!!!
Behold, my demonic wrath!
I have a touch of death. Beware!
I have been given a second life and I risk it delving into these blackened catacombs.
What is honor if we are to die a horrible death...
The life of a warrior is too rife with risk. I should retire and become a farmer instead.
It is when I am most comfortable, that the killers and cutthroats decide to emerge.
Even when beaten and exhausted, I will not be an easy target for you.
Try as you might, the silence of night makes poor cover for your clumsy footsteps.
Brand me with the outcast’s mark so that I may embody the suffering I hold within!
I bear many scars from many battles, but I hold the most grisly of them within!
I wear this mask to hide my shame, but I will bear the wounds of battle proudly!
You are not worthy of life. You are nothing.
Best me in combat and you will prove you are strong. You know you cannot.
In my home, you would be viewed as less than even the farmers.
I am a foreign visitor to these lands. Treat me with the utmost respect.
Give me the heads of your kills, so that I may present them and take credit.
You are all outcasts. You are beneath me and must serve my will.
I continue to think on the events of that night, and it continues to sadden me...
I never saw him again. I will never know why he did what he did...
All this killing, this bloodshed, it has eroded my soul...
Shall we slaughter a chicken and pay our dues to a bloodthirsty god?
Do you have a skewer? Souls taste best when roasted over hellfire.
Shing. Shing. I am imitating the battle cry of my weapon.
I am an unkillable man. Try to prove me wrong.
Try to harm me. I dare you.
I welcome the pain. I fear nothing.
Even if it will not restore my former glory, I will face death without fear...
I will be forgotten, but I will still die with dignity...
HAHAHAHAHA!
You are foolish to think that a vengeful spirit like me has a weakness!
Watch as I carve my own flesh, and know that you cannot hope to harm me.
I feel no pain. You do not believe me? Watch.
Cursed to a second life, perhaps it is best that I rest...
I have no hope of restoring my once proud image. This is the only option...
Haha! Bloody blades are my favorite delicacy!
I will rip my chest open, to prove that I am indeed a heartless demon!
You plot your escape route? I will not allow you!
With no smoke or mirrors, you will not escape my presence.
The coward's path leads to nothingness. What greater shame is there?
We will be greeted with contempt for our cowardice. Let us die a noble death...
Let us fight on! We will be remembered for our audacious nature!
Scars. Pain. Death. It is not to be feared, it is to be embraced!
I will not be banished! Not yet!
Wait! I have not had my fill!
My life flashes before me, just like that dreadful night!
Will I die a second time? Will there be a third life?!
So your ploy has begun? You seek to end my life here?
Your ambush begins, but I will not allow you victory!
You are my devoted serfs! You should be shielding me from danger!
Cowards! Eager to save yourselves rather than protect your lord!
Hahaha! I barely even felt that!
Oh, that will scar. Excellent!
Good try, but you should have aimed for the head.
They strike without salt and vinegar. Their attacks do not affect me!
I have died once already. It was not so bad.
Oof. That was a fatal blow, or was it? *wink wink*
If I am to die, let me die! I cannot stand this torture!
Kill me or let me live! Do not torment me like this!
I am no fool. Your monstrous allies are easy to predict.
I have faced your kind before. You always act the same.
What? Too scared to fight a demon?
I am a wide man. Surely it is not that hard to hit me.
Hehe. Trying to box with a shadow? Hehe.
Blades and claws tainted in darkness? Mmm, my favorite.
You fool! Now I must search for a different soul to claim!
You are proud of your triumph, but you only hinder me and my quest.
Did I say you could strike? I did not, you impudent child.
You attack recklessly, no discipline. You should feel ashamed.
Look at these simple creatures, fighting their meaningless fight. Haha!
Ah, the affairs of mortal beings. How quaint.
They have proven their skill in combat, let us leave now before it is too late!
A warrior knows when to back down, and it would be best that we do!
Merely an act. I know that you conspire with these monstrosities.
A convincing performance to some, but not to me.
Careless, brutish. You strike poorly and will be slain as a result.
*shakes head* You are an embarrassment to us all.
Phew. If you landed that blow, I would have been furious.
Nice try, but that kill is meant for someone more worthy, such as me.
Perhaps they are demons? Perhaps they are my kin?
Pft. Should have aimed for the heart.
Again and again, I am always last to suffer!
No! My peers and companions, slaughtered before me once more!
Good. That makes things simple.
Taken by the fiends. A fitting fate for a betrayer.
How does it feel? Is it like a sword through the heart?
Pain puts hair on the chest. I could use some too!
Let this be a lesson to all of you. Do not be this fool.
You lack grace, finesse. You are injured because you do not listen.
Oh yum! Let me suck on the wound!
Oh how kind of you to spill blood for me! I was getting rather parched!
An act of mercy? No, an act of torment! They toy with us!
We have not been maimed. Now is an opportune time to withdraw!
You do not fool me. Your prancing only serves to entertain me.
You think I believe your little act? I know real bloodlust when I see it.
Aw, no drink for me? Now I am sad.
Hehehe. Did you like my smoke bomb?
I am immobilized with fear! I am to suffer the same death again!
No, stop! I WANT OUT!
Moving me into the center of your trap? I will not fall for it.
You seek to put me in a disadvantageous position, but I will not allow it.
Hnnngh! No! I want to FEEEEEEEEEEEEL!
Sorry, my legs are shaking with pain and pleasure.
Be patient, you imp, or I will beat the patience into you.
Disobey me, and the end of my blade will be your new teacher.
Stop, unless you seek to be possessed demonically!
Halt! I am the warden and you need to get back into your cell!
Foreign medicines and apparatus are things I will not accept.
Hmm. Probably poisoned. I will pass.
What is this? AID?! No thanks.
Pft. I do not need this. I am a hardy man!
Do not give things to a vagrant, it is unwise...
You give to a lesser man. It will only hinder you in the future...
Ew. Bring me a stillborn child and we will talk.
Is it the key to my heart?
Your strange eldritch ways unnerve me.
I prefer traditional methods, not your unorthodox ones.
What is the cost of this treatment? I will not pay a debt that I do not know.
No! Let my heart bleed!
I am already dead, inside and out. Do not try to change me.
Away with you. You mettle in my affairs and it irritates me!
Why mend a broken soul? Let what is dying, die...
It is not enough. It will never be enough...
Heal my mind or heal nothing at all, for it is all pointless...
What kind of trickery is this? Flesh does not just magically heal!
I would like some herbal tea before we begin please.
Do you have anything to cure my undead state?
Gifts never come without a cost, and I suspect the cost is my life!
I have no need of aid, especially not that of a stranger!
Trying to appeal to my interests? I am not so easily swayed!
I do not need your aid to relish in this pain.
No. Let me enjoy my eternal suffering.
I do not need comfort. I will be strong.
To bolster me, would be to bolster a crumbling fortress...
It will not restore my honor. It will not restore who I am...
You would only be dragged down with me...
Your attempts to bless me will only end in my agonizing demise.
No no! What you are doing is an exorcism ritual. That is not what we want!
Please. I do not need to be stamped with seals of power.
It is fine to build relations with your allies, but do not let it be a hindrance.
Even in this dreary abode, know that you are worth something.
In my homeland, many die forgotten and unmourned. This will not happen to you.
I bear many scars from many encounters. Time will heal all your wounds.
After every battle, you must care to your wounds so that you may fight on.
I have mastered many techniques, but the art of healing is the most essential.
We are all lost in our ways, but soon we will find our path.
Do not let your camaraderie become a burden. I speak from experience.
Despite my dispassionate and grim demeanor, I do care for your well-being.
Thoughts of inadequacy plague my mind. I am sure to fail!
How can I call myself a master when I have faltered so much!
It is pointless. We are all doomed to the void and that time is now!
I have never needed help with my duty, and that will not change today.
Their ways are strange, and likely malicious in purpose.
I am alone in this strange place. I can trust no one.
I have been pulling out my teeth and cutting up my gums. Want to see?
These horns are very sharp. They will work nicely as hooks for my skin!
Let way. I must heat my blade so that it will cut cleanly into my flesh!
I will not let talentless fools drag me down with them.
I cannot hope to teach these mongrels anything.
Useless. These ones are too stubborn to learn my teachings.
I was a mentor to others once. Not anymore.
I have been alone for a decade. I can manage without them.
There is no benefit in aiding these outsiders.
I would only make things worse...
My touch is that of a vagrant. It would be best if I kept to myself...
For my services, one of you will have to offer me your firstborn.
Is there a lamb we can slaughter? It is mandatory.
WE BE DEMONS. That is all.
Devious. To disguise malice as good will is most cowardly.
Your methods are unconventional. I will not be subject to them.
Your dirty foreign hands will not touch me!
I like it rough.
Let us spar. You will use a blade, I will use my fists!
Here. Carve the mark of shame into my back!
I will not allow your grimey hands anywhere near me.
There is nothing you can do. Do not try to act otherwise.
You think you can help? I will inform you that you are terribly mistaken.
Please. It is not wise to offer kindness to a disgrace like me...
I am ashamed. I cannot possibly accept a kindness in this state...
I am worth less than an outcast. Leave me...
Pfft. Good luck, I am incorporeal!
Hissssssssss!
Poison in the grain. A coward's weapon.
This meal is laced in toxins. I know of your deceit.
I must trim the fat so that only muscle remains!
Fasting is a common practice in my homeland. I will demonstrate!
I am below even the peasants of my social caste. I do not deserve food...
I have no need for mortal food. I am already dead!
Bread and water will not sate me. I must feed on the hearts of my enemies!
You were promised coin for my head. Instead, you will taste the edge of my blade!
You. You are the assassin and your life ends now!
A disgraceful display. You deserve the death that comes for you!
Pitiful. To die by my hand is the only honor I can offer you!
You. Your soul is mine!
I am the Reaper, and I decree that your time is done!
I come closer to my redemption...
Find peace in death, it is the only mercy I can bestow.
I was master of my art, and I still am.
I am Death.
One by one, they will fall.
Another added to the tally.
I have had steel pierce my beating heart, I am no mortal man.
I see how I will depart. Shamed and forgotten...
I must survive! I must redeem my name and fix my past mistakes!
Do what must be done. My sacrifice will restore the honor I have lost so long ago.

An assassin from foreign lands, wielding a peculiar weapon of blade and chain. It is unknown what his intentions are in our pitiful estate, but he offers his grisly expertise to your cause.

The man I was is no more. Compassion is a weakness that will lead to failure.
I am as silent as the sleeping dead. My foes will be unbeknownst to their demise.
I have slain many to redeem myself. I am a quick and efficient killer.
Even in pure blackness, the darkest caverns can be navigated.

Garment

Believed to have been killed more than a decade ago, the Wraith is a man seeking to redeem his dishonored name by serving as his master’s personal assassin. Years of heartless slaughter has shaped him into a brutal and efficient killer. Using an intricate weapon made to counter his most common targets, the Wraith ensnares his victims in tightening chains before delivering a fatal blow with the bladed side of his wicked tool.

The Wraith travels to many faraway places to fulfill the grisly deeds given to him by his masters. As a result, he sacrifices the heavier armor commonly worn by warriors of his homeland in favor of lighter attire that also allows him the freedom of movement to use his deadly weapon. The blade and chain he wields is used with frightening flexibility. He can fling the bladed side to lacerate and execute his victims or use the blunt side as a flail to incapacitate his foes.

A menacing assassin with no emotions, the Wraith has learned to be most effective in the dark of the night. He is eerily silent despite his physique, and he uses this to his advantage. He can strike unseen from the shadows, besting even creatures that live entirely in blackness.
Una muerte en vano. No alivia nada el precio que he de pagar.
¡Moriré por segunda vez, y será una muerte tan patética como la primera!
¡No he pagado completamente mi deuda, moriré olvidado!
¡He recolectado una década en almas, y todo será para nada!
¡He cambiado cientos de vidas por la mía, y ni siquiera eso me ayudará en este momento!
¡¿Os envían los Sogunes?! ¡¿Han roto el pacto?!
¿Queréis acabar conmigo? ¡No voy a permitir eso cuando estoy tan cerca de la redención!
Hmmm. Asesinos sin carácter, enviados para evitar que cumpla mi hazaña.
Se avecina la traición. Pero no seré engañado más.
¿Habéis venido para cobrar la recompensa por mi cabeza? Será vuestro último error.
Me apuñalaron en el corazón, y fue la mejor sensación que he sentido nunca.
Esas cadenas me aprietan muchísimo. Es un auténtico placer.
Aunque siempre agonizo, he aprendido a encontrar consuelo en ello.
Donde hay dolor, puede haber placer.
En la angustia de mi corazón atravesado, he encontrado la paz.
Insufribles. No os habéis entrenado en condiciones para esta misión.
Dejáis que vuestras emociones guíen vuestras acciones. Sois indisciplinados y no estáis cualificados para el trabajo.
Sois todos decepcionantes. Atisbos de potencial echados a perder por la incompetencia.
No tenéis ni orgullo ni honor. Seguís el mismo camino maldito que yo.
He caído en desgracia, y ahora debo acompañar de mala gana a estos desdichados.
Ofreceré las cabezas de hombres, mujeres y niños para redimir mi nombre.
¿La vida de esos campesinos para restaurar mi gloria? Aceptaría sin dudarlo.
Fallé porque me preocupé por otra persona. No volverá a pasar otra vez.
Soy indiferente, asocial, despiadado.
Me han encargado una tarea, y la cumpliré sin importar cual sea el sacrificio.
Tras una década sin sentir nada por la masacre, sigo anhelando su toque...
Me he convertido en alguien muy cercano, y eso me ha convertido en el monstruo que soy ahora...
Mis estudiantes... yo era débil, y les fallé a todos...
Detrás de este rostro sombrío hay un hombre roto...
Mi corazón, aún siente dolor por el amor que creía compartir...
Soy el cosechador. Soy el carcelero. ¡SOY LA MUERTE!
¡Ya he muerto una vez! ¡Soy una aparición vengativa en busca de sangre!
¿Es esta la otra vida? Si lo es, es bastante divertida.
¡Soy una criatura impía, un demonio que anda sobre la tierra!
¡Soy el Avatar de la Muerte! ¡Todo caerá bajo mi arma!
El combate es un arte, y lo domino totalmente.
Mi nombre será recordado. ¡Los errores de mi pasado serán borrados!
Hmm, me he visto en situaciones peores.
He matado a un montón de hombres, y todos ellos imponían más que esta escoria.
Casi he pagado mi deuda por completo. No puedo fallar ahora.
Mi nombre será redimido. Seré recordado como un guerrero honorable.
Soy un hombre monstruoso. Estas bestias van a conocer el miedo.
No me asusta el rostro del terror. No dudo en matar.
Ya sobreviví a una herida mortal en el pasado. ¿Que otra cosa podría detenerme?
Solo cuando todos los pecados de mi pasado sean limpiados podré aceptar mi segunda muerte.
Ya he muerto una vez. No tengo razón para que me asuste el morir una segunda vez.
Mi yo más joven tendría problemas para enfrentarse a estos horrores, pero yo ya no soy ese hombre.
Las entidades demoníacas no me dan ningún miedo. Dejad que mi coraje os inspire.
Un maestro enseña con el ejemplo. Dejad que mi valentía os sirva como guía.
Atacad con decisión. Un ataque es inútil si no se acompaña de decisión.
Siempre hay una debilidad. Encuéntrala y saldrás victorioso.
Las emociones son poderosas. Usadlas a vuestro beneficio.
¡Sabed que una muerte honorable es mejor destino que una vida de cobardía!
Hmm, no le haré caso a esa herida.
Nada con lo que no haya tenido que lidiar antes.
¡Moriremos como cobardes, olvidados en los dominios de estos demonios!
¡En todos mis años de experiencia nunca me había enfrentado a un enemigo tan maligno y malévolo!
No habrá gloria alguna en nuestras muertes. ¡Solo dolor y sufrimiento!
Trabajáis para los Sogunes, ¡y habéis venido para aseguraros de que nunca pueda pagar la deuda!
¡Intentáis dificultar mi tarea, no dejaré que impidáis que restaure mi honor!
Ya me confié en alguien una vez, y me condujo a mi primera muerte. ¡No volverá a pasar!
La muerte es tan fría. ¡El dolor me hace sentir calidez de nuevo!
Donde debería haber un corazón, solo soporto una herida, ¡porque el dolor invoca las emociones más fuertes!
El arma. Una señora preciosa que puede arrebatar las cargas de la vida!
Una vez fui maestro, pero no hay nada que pueda enseñar a imbéciles como vosotros.
He sacrificado mi humanidad para redimir mi nombre. ¿Qué habéis conseguido vosotros?
Moriréis como lo hice yo, deshonrado y olvidado.
Si los Sogunes lo ordenaran, les ofrecería vuestras vidas sin dudarlo.
He matado a muchos inocentes para preservar mi honor. Y no pienso parar.
Mi reputación es lo que cuenta. Seré elogiado por mi primera vida y temido por ésta.
Incluso si rehabilitara mi nombre, tanta muerte me amargará el resto de mi vida...
Iba a guiar a una nueva generación hacia la gloria, pero los guié a su caída...
Era elogiado, respetado, y como un idiota lo eché todo a perder...
Las almas inocentes saben mejor. ¡Tan jugosas y suculentas!
Esta cadena está enrollada en mi brazo doce veces. ¡Eso es más del doble de seis!
Prefiero a mis demonios a vuestros eldritchs.
Las sombras son mis aliadas. ¡El guerrero que no es visto es el que vive!
Huir como un cobarde, o morir como un cobarde, ¡la elección es obvia!
El peligro se desvela, y debo sobrevivir!
Debo mantenerme siempre alerta, ¡no vaya a ser que a malvados como vosotros les de por acabar con mi vida abruptamente!
¡He lidiado con asesinos rivales antes, no seré atrapado tan fácilmente!
Sois alimañas sin honor. ¡No dejaré que me apuñaléis por la espalda!
La muerte no fue tan mala. ¡Una segunda muerte debería ser tan indolora como la primera!
No conozco el miedo. ¡Me enfrentaré a esas criaturas cara a cara!
¡Un guerrero ejemplar no se retiraría ante tal muestra de ferocidad!
¡Compañeros demoníacos! ¡Abracémonos los unos a los otros!
Más cerca, quiero saborear vuestro miedo.
Ja, ja. ¡Mirad como huyen ante mí!
Como un fantasma impío, me desvaneceré de la vista.
¡Noooooooo! ¡Blanden los símbolos de mi anatema!
¡La Luz es demasiado brillante, debo retirarme hacia las sombras!
El poco honor que me queda, debo preservarlo con un sacrificio abnegado...
Mi nombre está en ruinas. Debo aceptar mi destino y ser olvidado...
Quien yo era se disipó, quien soy ahora también debería hacerlo...
¡E-estoy avergonzado! ¡Quiero escapar de este paisaje infernal!
¡S-soy un cobarde! ¡No tengo suficiente voluntad para hacer lo que debe hacerse!
¡D-dicen la verdad! Soy una rata inmunda, ¡huyendo a la seguridad de las sombras!
¡Esa muerte me pertenece! ¡Cada vida que tomo me lleva más cerca de mi meta!
¡Soy un auténtico guerrero, quitaos de en medio!
¡Seré yo quien pegue el golpe final!
Enfréntate tú a los peligros primero, veo que tampoco es que tengas mucha fama para tu nombre.
¡He aprendido que la clave de la supervivencia es dejar que un tonto ocupe tu lugar!
El maestro observa a sus estudiantes, ¡y tu serás hoy mi estudiante!
El miedo al fracaso, a mis esfuerzos en vano, ¡me paraliza!
¡P-pasó otra vez! ¡Mis emociones me hacen dudar!
¡La memoria vuelve! ¡Recuerdos de aquella noche terrible!
El que ataque primero, es el que caerá en la trampa del traidor.
Los ataques preventivos son muy arriesgados. Esperaré a que las ratas se revelen ellas solitas.
Soy un hombre paciente. Los asesinos atacarán y yo robaré su aliento final.
Un maestro no debería desperdiciar sus fuerzas.
Me hago viejo. Los jóvenes deben ocupar mi lugar.
Tengo el corazón sofocado. Necesito un respiro.
Llevo años haciendo esta tarea desagradable, ya he perdido toda esperanza en poder completarla...
Años más tarde, sigo sin saber que es lo que debería haber hecho...
Debo estarme quieto, como la estatua de un león.
Sino me muevo, no podrán detectarme.
Al final van a pasar por aquí. Solo tengo que esperar.
Tus órdenes me llevarán a una caída prematura. ¡Yo sé mejor que nadie que es lo que hay que hacer!
¡No obedeceré a alguien tan joven e ingenuo!
¡En este extraño lugar solo obedezco a un maestro, y soy yo mismo!
¡La pasión de una naturaleza distinta toma el control de mi cuerpo!
Soy un animal salvaje, ¡incapaz de reprimir mis instintos más básicos!
Soy un ser emotivo, ¡no puedo negarlo!
Ya he hecho este acto sangriento durante dos vidas enteras, se perfectamente que es lo que estoy haciendo.
Aquí. Testigo de la auténtica habilidad.
¡Qué absurdo! Tengo que enseñar a insensatos como vosotros como luchar en mitad de un combate real.
¡Esa muerte es mía!
¡Quitaos de en medio! ¡Yo me llevaré toda esta gloria y no podréis detenerme!
¡El que da el golpe final es el que reclama la gloria!
¡Ya he perdido mi voluntad! ¡Mis acciones están todas mal!
¡Me supera la situación! ¡He olvidado mi propósito!
Me he desviado del camino. ¡Ya no sé que es lo correcto!
¡¡¡GRRR!!!
¡Contemplad mi ira diabólica!
Tengo el toque de la muerte. ¡Cuidado!
Me dan una segunda vida y la arriesgo indagando en catacumbas ennegrecidas.
De que sirve el honor si vamos a morir de una forma tan horrible...
La vida del guerrero está llena de riesgos. Debería retirarme ya y volverme granjero.
Y así es cuando me encuentro más cómodo, cuando los asesinos y los degolladores deciden emerger.
Aunque esté herido y cansado, ni siquiera así seré un objetivo fácil para vosotros.
Inténtalo si puedes, el silencio de la noche delata tus ruidosos pasos.
¡Señaladme como a un paria y así podré personificar todo el sufrimiento que contengo!
¡Tengo cicatrices de muchas batallas, pero las más macabras están en el interior!
Visto esta máscara para esconder mi vergüenza, ¡pero llevaré las cicatrices de la batalla con orgullo!
No sois dignos de vivir. No sois nada.
Si me derrotas en combate probarás que eres fuerte. Sé que no puedes.
En mi hogar, los campesinos están mejor considerados que vosotros.
Soy un visitante extranjero a estas tierras. Debéis tratarme con el mayor de los respetos.
Dadme las cabezas que prueban vuestras muertes, así podré presentarlas y llevarme yo el mérito.
Todos vosotros sois parias. Estáis por debajo mía y debéis servir a mi voluntad.
Aún sigo pensando en lo que pasó aquella noche, y me sigue entristeciendo...
No volví a verle más. Nunca sabré por qué el hizo lo que hizo...
Toda esta matanza, la sangre derramada, ha erosionado mi alma...
¿Deberíamos sacrificar un pollo y así pagar nuestras deudas con un dios sediento de sangre?
¿Tenéis un pincho moruno? Las almas saben mejor cocinadas sobre un fuego infernal.
Shin. Shin. Imito el grito de batalla de mi arma.
Soy un hombre inmortal. Intenta probar que me equivoco.
Intenta herirme. Te reto.
Doy la bienvenida al dolor. No temo a nada.
Aunque no restaure mi antigua gloria, enfrentaré la muerte sin ningún miedo...
Seré olvidado, pero al menos moriré con dignidad...
¡JA JA JA JA JA JA!
¡Hay que ser idiota para creer que un espíritu vengativo como yo tiene alguna debilidad!
Mirad como trincho mi propia carne, y sabed como no tenéis esperanza alguna de hacerme daño.
No siento dolor alguno. ¿No me creéis? Mirad.
Condenado a una segunda vida, sería mejor que descansara...
Ya no tengo esperanza en recuperar mi antigua imagen orgullosa. Esta es la única opción...
¡Ja, ja! ¡Los filos ensangrentados son mi exquisitez favorita!
Me abriré el pecho, ¡así podré demostraros que soy un demonio sin corazón!
¿Tramáis vuestra ruta de escape? ¡No os lo permitiré!
Sin humo ni espejos, no podéis escapar de mi presencia.
La senda del cobarde lleva a la nada. ¿Por qué sería más vergonzoso quedarse aquí?
Solo se nos recompensará por desprecio por nuestra cobardía. Déjanos morir una muerte noble...
¡Luchemos! ¡Seremos recordados por nuestra naturaleza audaz!
Cicatrices. Dolor. Muerte. ¡No deben temerse, sino abrazarse!
¡No seré proscrito, aún no!
¡Esperad, aún no he tenido mi momento!
¡Mi vida pasa delante de mis ojos, como en aquella noche terrible!
¿Moriré una segunda vez? ¡¿Habrá una tercera vida?!
¿Tu ardid ha empezado, quieres acabar con mi vida aquí?
¡Empieza vuestra emboscada, pero no dejaré que salgáis victoriosos!
¡Solo sois mis devotos siervos! ¡Tenéis que escudarme de todo peligro!
¡Cobardes! ¡Ansiosos por salvaros a vosotros mismos en vez de proteger a vuestro señor!
¡Ja ja ja! ¡Ni siquiera lo he sentido!
Oh, dejará cicatriz. ¡Excelente!
Buen intento, pero tendríais que haber apuntado a la cabeza.
Atacan sin sal ni vinagre. ¡Sus ataques no me afectan!
Ya morí una vez. No estuvo tan mal.
Oh. ¿Era eso en serio un golpe fatal? *guiño, guiño*
Si voy a morir, ¡dejadme morir, no puedo aguantar más esta tortura!
¡Matadme o dejadme vivo, pero no me atormentéis así!
No soy idiota. Vuestros aliados monstruosos son predecibles.
Ya me he enfrentado a vuestra calaña antes. Siempre actuáis igual.
¿Qué, demasiado asustado para luchar contra un demonio?
Soy un hombre corpulento. Seguramente no sea tan difícil impactarme.
Je je. ¿Intentando golpear a una sombra? Je je.
¿Cuchillas y garras contaminadas de oscuridad? Mmm, mis favoritas.
¡Imbécil! ¡Ahora debo buscar otra vida diferente para reclamarla!
Estás orgulloso de tu triunfo, pero solo me estorbas a mí y a mí misión.
¿Te dí permiso para que atacaras? No te lo dí, niñato insolente.
Atacas a lo loco, sin disciplina. Debería darte vergüenza.
Mira a esas criaturas simples, peleando por su lucha sin sentido. ¡Ja ja!
Ah, los asuntos de los seres mortales. Muy pintorescos.
Ellos ya han probado su valía en combate, ¡huyamos antes de que sea demasiado tarde!
Un guerrero debe saber cuando retroceder, ¡y será mejor que lo hagamos!
Solo disimulas. Sé que conspiras con esas monstruosidades.
Puede que hayas engañado a los demás, pero a mí no me engañas.
Imprudente, bruto. Atacas muy mal y te van a matar como resultado.
*Niega con la cabeza* Eres una vergüenza para todos nosotros.
¡Uf!. Si hubieras acertado ese golpe, me habría enfurecido.
Buen intento, pero esa muerte era para la cuenta de alguien más digno, como yo.
¿A lo mejor son demonios? ¿Puede que sean de los míos?
Pfff. Tendría que haber apuntado al corazón.
Una vez y otra. ¡Siempre soy el último en sufrir!
¡No! ¡Mis colegas y compañeros, masacrados delante mía una vez más!
Bien, eso simplifica las cosas.
Llevado por los malvados. Un destino apropiado para un traidor.
¿Que tal sienta? ¿Es como una espada atravesando el corazón?
El dolor brota vello del pecho. ¡Pruébalo!
Será una lección para todos vosotros. No seáis tan idiotas como este.
Careces de gracia, de agilidad. Has sido herido por no escuchar.
¡Oh, qué delicioso! ¡Déjame lamer la herida!
¡Oh, que amabilidad derramando tu sangre para mí, ya estaba sediento!
¿Un acto de misericordia? ¡No, una tortura, juegan con nosotros!
Todavía no nos han mutilado. ¡Es un buen momento para retirarse!
No me engañas. Tus cabriolas solo me entretienen.
¿Piensas que me creo tu pésima actuación? Reconozco la sed de sangre cuando la veo.
Ah, ¿no hay bebida para mí? Ahora estoy triste.
Je je je. ¿Te ha gustado mi granada de humo?
¡El miedo me paraliza! ¡Voy a morir otra vez!
No, ¡para! ¡QUIERO IRME!
¿Moviéndome al centro de tu trampa? No voy a picar.
Buscas colocarme en una posición desventajosa, pero no lo permitiré.
¡Arggg! ¡No! ¡Quiero SENTIIIIIIIIIIIIIIR!
Lo siento, mis piernas tiemblan a la vez de dolor y placer.
Tienes que ser paciente, granuja, te enseñaré la paciencia.
Desobedéceme y el filo de mi arma será tu nuevo maestro.
Para, ¡a menos que busques una posesión demoníaca!
¡Alto! ¡Soy el carcelero y tienes que volver a tu celda!
Medicinas y cacharros extranjeros que no aceptaré.
Hmm. Posiblemente envenenado. Paso.
¿Qué es esto? ¡¿AYUDA?! No, gracias.
Pfff. No lo necesito. ¡Soy un tipo duro!
No le deis muchos objetos a un vagabundo, no es inteligente...
Si le dais muchas cosas a un hombre de menor rango, solo os perjudicará en el futuro...
Ehm. Traeme a un recién nacido y puede que hablemos.
¿Es la clave para intentar llegar a mi corazón?
Tu extraño modo eldritch de hacer las cosas me pone nervioso.
Prefiero los métodos tradicionales a los tuyos poco ortodoxos.
¿Cuál es el coste de este tratamiento? No voy a pagar deudas que desconozco.
¡No, deja que mi corazón sangre!
Ya estoy muerto, por dentro y por fuera. No intentes cambiarme.
Vete. ¡Te entrometes en mis asuntos y me irritas!
¿Por qué curar a un alma rota? Deja morir a lo que está muriendo...
No es suficiente. Nunca será suficiente...
Cura mi mente o no cures nada, sino no sirve para nada...
¿Qué tipo de truco es éste? ¡La carne no se cura mágicamente!
Me gustaría tomar algo como un té de hierbas antes de empezar, por favor.
¿Tienes algo que cure mi estado de no-muerte?
Los regalos nunca vienen sin un coste, ¡y sospecho que el coste es mi vida!
No necesito ayuda, ¡y mucho menos de un extraño!
¿Intentando apelar a mis intereses? ¡No me dejo persuadir tan fácilmente!
No necesito tu ayuda para aliviar este dolor.
No. Déjame disfrutar de mi sufrimiento eterno.
No necesito comodidades. Seré fuerte.
Apoyarme a mí, sería como apoyar a una fortaleza que se desmorona...
No restauraré mi honor. No rehabilitaré a mi persona...
Solo te arrastraría conmigo...
Tus intentos de bendecirme solo terminan en mi muerte agonizante.
¡No, no! Lo que intentas hacer es un ritual de exorcismo. ¡No es lo que quiero!
Por favor. No necesito ser estampado con sellos de poder.
Está bien relacionarte con tus aliados, pero no dejes que sea un impedimento.
Incluso en esta sitio deprimente, creo que vales algo.
En mi tierra, muchos mueren olvidados y sin que nadie haga luto por ellos. No te pasará a tí.
Tengo muchas cicatrices de muchos encuentros. Hora de curar todas tus heridas.
Después de cada batalla, tienes que que cuidar tus heridas para que puedas seguir luchando.
Domino muchas técnicas, pero el arte de la curación es la más básica.
Todos estamos perdidos a nuestra manera, pero pronto encontraremos nuestro camino.
No dejéis que vuestra camaradería se vuelva una carga. Hablo desde la experiencia.
A pesar de mi apariencia desapasionada y sombría, en realidad me preocupo por vuestro bienestar.
Pensamientos inadecuados plagan mi mente. ¡Estoy seguro de fracasar!
¡Cómo podría llamarme a mí mismo maestro cuando he flaqueado tanto!
No tiene sentido. ¡Todos estamos condenados al vacío y ha llegado su hora!
Nunca he necesitado ayuda para cumplir mi deber, y eso no va a cambiar hoy.
Sus formas son extrañas, y tienen pinta de ser maliciosas a propósito.
Estoy solo en este lugar extraño. No puedo fiarme de nadie.
He estado sacándome los dientes y rajándome las encías. ¿Quieres verlo?
Esos cuernos están muy afilados. ¡Funcionarán muy bien como ganchos para mi piel!
Permíteme. ¡Debo calentar la hoja de mi arma para poder cortar limpiamente mi carne!
No permitiré que idiotas sin talento me arrastren con ellos.
No puedo esperar enseñarle a estos chuchos.
Inútiles. Son demasiado testarudos para aprender mis enseñanzas.
Yo fui el mentor de otros una vez. Nunca más.
He estado solo una década. Puedo apañármelas sin ellos.
No hay ningún beneficio en ayudar a estos forasteros.
Solo empeoraría las cosas...
Tengo el toque del vagabundo. Será mejor que me lo reserve para mí mismo...
Por mis servicios, uno de vosotros tendrá que ofrecerme a su primogénito.
¡Hay algún corderito que podamos matar? Es obligatorio.
SOMOS DEMONIOS. Eso es todo.
Retorcido. Ocultar la maldad como buena voluntad es lo más cobarde.
Tus métodos son poco convencionales. No seré el sujeto de pruebas.
¡Tus sucias manos forasteras no me tocarán!
Me gusta que sea severo.
Vamos a pelear. ¡Puedes usar un arma cortante, yo usaré mis puños!
Aquí. ¡Talla la marca de la vergüenza en mi espalda!
No permitiré que vuestras sucias manos se acerquen a mí.
No hay nada que puedas hacer. Intenta no pretender que podrías actuar de otra forma.
¿Piensas que puedes ayudar? Te informo de que te equivocas completamente.
Por favor. No es inteligente ser amable con una desgracia como yo...
Estoy avergonzado. No puedo aceptar amabilidad en este estado...
Valgo menos que un paria. Déjame...
Pfff... buena suerte con ello, ¡soy incorpóreo!
¡Ssssssssss!
Veneno en los cereales. El arma de un cobarde.
Esta comida se ha mezclado con toxinas. Conozco vuestros engaños.
¡Debo reducir la grasa, hasta que solo me quede músculo!
El ayuno es una práctica muy común en mi tierra natal. ¡Lo demostraré!
Estoy por debajo de los campesinos en mi casta social. No merezco comida...
No tengo necesidad de comida para mortales. ¡Ya estoy muerto!
El pan y el agua no me sacian. ¡Debo comerme los corazones de mis enemigos!
¡Te prometieron monedas por mi cabeza,en vez de eso, probarás el filo de mi cuchilla!
Tú. ¡Eres el asesino y tu vida acaba ahora!
Una demostración desafortunada. ¡Te mereces la muerte que viene a por tí!
Patético. ¡Morir por mi mano es el único honor que puedo concederte!
Tú. ¡Tu alma es mía!
Soy el cosechador, ¡y decreto que ha llegado tu hora!
Me acerco a mi redención...
Encuentra paz en la muerte, es la única compasión que puedo otorgarte.
Era un maestro de mi arte, y sigo siéndolo.
Soy la muerte.
Uno a uno, todos ellos caerán.
Otro añadido a la cuenta.
He visto como el acero perforaba mi corazón latiente, no soy un hombre mortal.
Mirad como me iré. Avergonzado y olvidado...
¡Debo sobrevivir! ¡Debo redimir mi nombre y arreglar los errores de mi pasado!
Haz lo que debes. Mi sacrificio restaurará el honor que perdí hace ya tanto tiempo.

Un asesino de tierras lejanas, porta un arma peculiar consistente en una hoz y una cadena. Se desconocen cuales son sus intenciones en nuestro deplorable feudo, pero ofrece su horripilante pericia a nuestra causa.
Sin honor
Despojados de su nobleza y desterrados de sus hogares, estos guerreros deambulantes buscan salvar la poca dignidad que les queda uniéndose a las maltrechas fuerzas de tu feudo.

El hombre que yo era ya no existe. La compasión es una debilidad que lleva al fracaso.
Soy tan silencioso como la muerte durmiente. Mis enemigos no esperan su fallecimiento.
He matado a muchos para redimirme. Soy un asesino rápido y eficiente.
Pueden recorrerse las cavernas más tenebrosas, incluso en la más absoluta oscuridad.
Sello de agilidad

Se cree que fue asesinado hace más de una década, el espectro es un hombre buscando redimir su nombre deshonrado sirviendo como el asesino personal de su maestro. Años de masacres crueles le han convertido en un asesino brutal y eficiente. Utiliza un arma única diseñada para contrarrestar a los objetivos más comunes, el espectro atrapa a su víctima con cadenas que le apresan antes de dar el golpe fatal con la cuchilla de su retorcida herramienta.

El espectro viaja a muchos lugares lejanos para cumplir los horripilantes encargos de sus maestros. Como resultado ha sacrificado la armadura pesada que normalmente visten los guerreros de su tierra por un atuendo algo más ligero, que le permite más libertad de movimientos para utilizar su mortífera arma. La hoz con cadena que blande tiene una gran adaptabilidad. Puede utilizar el extremo afilado para lacerar y ejecutar a sus víctimas o el extremo romo como un mangual para incapacitar a sus enemigos.

Un asesino amenazante e insensible, el espectro ha aprendido a ser más efectivo al amparo de la oscuridad nocturna. Es aterradoramente silencioso a pesar de su físico, y lo usa a su favor. Puede atacar desde las sombras sin ser visto, incluso superando en esta faceta a las criaturas que viven en la oscuridad.
A worthless kill. It does not lessen the price I must pay.
I will die a second time, and it will be as pathetic as my first death!
I have not paid my full due! I will die forgotten!
I have collected a decade's worth of souls, yet it will all be for nothing!
I have traded hundreds of lives for my own, but it will not save me in this moment!
Have the Shoguns sent you?! Have they broken their deal?!
You seek to end me? I will not allow such when I am so close to redemption!
Hmph. Spineless assassins, sent to ensure I never finish my deed.
Betrayal is afoot. I will not be fooled again.
Come to claim the bounty on my head? It will be your last mistake.
I was stabbed through the heart, and it was the best thing I had ever felt.
These chains wrap tightly around me. It is pleasing.
I am always in agony, and I have learned to find solace in it.
Where there is pain, there can be pleasure.
In the anguish of my punctured heart, I have found peace.
Insufferable. You have not been trained properly for this task.
You let emotion drive your actions. You are undisciplined, unskilled.
You are all disappointments. Glimmers of potential, snuffed out by incompetence.
You have no pride, no honor. You follow the same damned path as I do.
I have fallen from grace, and now I must sulk in the dark with these wretches.
I will offer the heads of men, women, and children to redeem my name.
The life of these peasants to restore my glory? I would accept without hesitation.
I failed because I cared for another. That will not happen again.
I am uncaring, distanced, remorseless.
I have been given a task, and I will complete it no matter the sacrifice.
Even after a decade of unfeeling slaughter, I still yearn for his touch...
I had become too attached, and it twisted me into the monster I am now...
My students...I was weak, and I failed them all...
Behind this grim visage, a broken man...
My heart, it still aches for the love I thought I shared...
I am the reaper. I am the jailor. I AM DEATH!
I have died once already! I am a vengeful revenant on the hunt for blood!
Is this the afterlife? If so, it is rather droll.
I am an unholy creature, a demon walking the earth!
I am the Aspect of Death! All will fall to my blade!
Combat is an art, and I have mastered it to the fullest.
My name will be remembered. My past mistakes will be erased!
Hmph, I have seen worse.
I have killed many men, all of which were far more fearsome than this rabble.
I am close to paying my debt in full. I cannot fail now.
My name will be redeemed. I will be remembered as an honorable warrior.
I am a monster of a man. These beasts will know fear.
I do not flinch in the face of terror. I do not hesitate to kill.
I have survived a fatal blow in the past. What more could possibly stop me.
Only when my past sins have been cleansed will I finally accept my second death.
I have died once already. I have no reason to fear death again.
My younger self would struggle to face such horrors, but I am not that man.
I am fearless in the face of demonic entities. Let my courage inspire you.
A master leads through action. Let my bravery serve as your guide.
Strike with purpose. An attack is useless if it lacks conviction.
There is always a weakness. Find it and you will be the victor.
Emotions are a powerful thing. Use them to your benefit.
Know that to die with honor is a greater fate than to live in cowardice!
Hmph, I will shrug it off.
This is nothing I have not dealt with before.
We will die as cowards, forgotten in this domain of demons!
In all my years, I have never fought a foe so baleful, so malevolent!
There will be no glory in our deaths. Only torment and suffering!
You work for the Shoguns, and you have come to ensure the debt is never paid!
You seek to undermine my task! I will let no one stop me from restoring my honor!
I trusted another once, and it led to my first death. That will not happen again!
Death is so, so cold. Pain will allow me to feel warmth again!
Where a heart would be, I bear a scar instead, for pain invokes the strongest emotions!
The blade. It is a beautiful mistress that can take away the burdens of life!
I was a teacher once, but there is nothing I could teach to fools like you.
I have sacrificed my humanity to redeem my name. What have you accomplished?
You will die as I have. Shamed and forgotten.
If the Shoguns decreed it, I would offer them your lives in a heartbeat.
I have killed many innocents in my quest to preserve my honor. I do not plan to stop.
My reputation is what matters. I will be praised in my first life and feared in this one.
Even if I restore my name, the killing will burden me for the rest of my years...
I was to guide a new generation to glory, but instead I lead them to their demise...
I was praised, respected, and I foolishly threw it all away...
Innocent souls taste the best. So juicy and succulent!
This chain is wrapped around my arm twelve times. That is twice more than six!
I prefer my demonic deities over your eldritch entities.
The shadows serve as my ally. The unseen warrior is the one to live!
Flee as a coward or die as a coward, the choice is obvious!
Peril presents itself, and I must survive!
I must keep a watchful eye, lest you fiends decide to end my life abruptly!
I have dealt with rival assassins before, I will not be so easily caught!
You are honorless vermin. I will not allow you to stab me in the back!
Death was not so bad. A second death should be as painless as the first!
I know no fear. I will face these creatures head on!
An exemplary warrior would not back down in the face of such ferocity!
Demonic brethren! Let us embrace each other!
Come closer, I wish to taste your fear.
Haha! Look at how they flee before me!
Like an unholy phantom, I will vanish from sight.
Noooooooo! They bear the symbols of my anathema!
The Light is too bright! I will retreat to the shadows!
What little honor I have left, I will preserve with a selfless sacrifice...
My name is in ruins. I may as well accept my fate and be forgotten...
As who I was fades away, so too shall I...
I-I am shameful! I seek to flee from this hellscape!
I-I am a coward! I do not possess the will to complete what must be done!
T-they speak the truth! I am a lowly rat, fleeing to the safety of the shadows!
The kill belongs to me! Every life I take brings me closer to my goal!
I am a true warrior! Move aside!
I will be the one to strike the final blow!
You will face danger first, seeing as you have little to attribute to your name.
I have learned that the key to survival is to let a fool take your place!
A teacher watches his students, and you will be my student today!
The fear of failure, of my wasted efforts, it paralyzes me!
I-it happens once more! My emotions cause me to hesitate!
Memories return! Flashes of that terrible night!
He who strikes first, will surely fall for the traitor's trap.
A preemptive strike is too risky. I will wait for the rats to reveal themselves.
I am a patient man. The assassins will strike and I will steal their final breath.
A master should not have to waste his efforts.
I am getting on in years. You younger ones can take over in my place.
I have a deadened heart. Give me a moment to rest.
I have done this dreadful deed for years, and I have lost all hope to completing it...
Years later, I still hesitate to do what must be done...
I must remain still, like a lion's statue.
If I do not move, they will fail to detect me.
They will get over here. I must simply wait.
Your orders will lead me to an untimely demise. I will do what I know is best!
I will not obey someone so young and naive!
In this strange land I listen to only one master, and that is me!
Passion of a different nature takes over me!
I am a feral animal, unable to deny my basest instincts!
I am an emotional creature, and I cannot deny it!
I have performed this bloody act for two lifetimes. I know what I am doing.
Here. Witness an example of true skill.
How absurd. I must show you half-wits how to fight in the midst of live combat.
The kill is mine!
Away with you! I will have this glory and you cannot stop me!
He who lands the killing blow is the one to claim the glory!
I have lost my will! My actions are misguided!
I am lost in a daze! I have lost purpose!
I have strayed from the path. I do not know the right course of action!
RAWR!!!
Behold, my demonic wrath!
I have a touch of death. Beware!
I have been given a second life and I risk it delving into these blackened catacombs.
What is honor if we are to die a horrible death...
The life of a warrior is too rife with risk. I should retire and become a farmer instead.
It is when I am most comfortable, that the killers and cutthroats decide to emerge.
Even when beaten and exhausted, I will not be an easy target for you.
Try as you might, the silence of night makes poor cover for your clumsy footsteps.
Brand me with the outcast’s mark so that I may embody the suffering I hold within!
I bear many scars from many battles, but I hold the most grisly of them within!
I wear this mask to hide my shame, but I will bear the wounds of battle proudly!
You are not worthy of life. You are nothing.
Best me in combat and you will prove you are strong. You know you cannot.
In my home, you would be viewed as less than even the farmers.
I am a foreign visitor to these lands. Treat me with the utmost respect.
Give me the heads of your kills, so that I may present them and take credit.
You are all outcasts. You are beneath me and must serve my will.
I continue to think on the events of that night, and it continues to sadden me...
I never saw him again. I will never know why he did what he did...
All this killing, this bloodshed, it has eroded my soul...
Shall we slaughter a chicken and pay our dues to a bloodthirsty god?
Do you have a skewer? Souls taste best when roasted over hellfire.
Shing. Shing. I am imitating the battle cry of my weapon.
I am an unkillable man. Try to prove me wrong.
Try to harm me. I dare you.
I welcome the pain. I fear nothing.
Even if it will not restore my former glory, I will face death without fear...
I will be forgotten, but I will still die with dignity...
HAHAHAHAHA!
You are foolish to think that a vengeful spirit like me has a weakness!
Watch as I carve my own flesh, and know that you cannot hope to harm me.
I feel no pain. You do not believe me? Watch.
Cursed to a second life, perhaps it is best that I rest...
I have no hope of restoring my once proud image. This is the only option...
Haha! Bloody blades are my favorite delicacy!
I will rip my chest open, to prove that I am indeed a heartless demon!
You plot your escape route? I will not allow you!
With no smoke or mirrors, you will not escape my presence.
The coward's path leads to nothingness. What greater shame is there?
We will be greeted with contempt for our cowardice. Let us die a noble death...
Let us fight on! We will be remembered for our audacious nature!
Scars. Pain. Death. It is not to be feared, it is to be embraced!
I will not be banished! Not yet!
Wait! I have not had my fill!
My life flashes before me, just like that dreadful night!
Will I die a second time? Will there be a third life?!
So your ploy has begun? You seek to end my life here?
Your ambush begins, but I will not allow you victory!
You are my devoted serfs! You should be shielding me from danger!
Cowards! Eager to save yourselves rather than protect your lord!
Hahaha! I barely even felt that!
Oh, that will scar. Excellent!
Good try, but you should have aimed for the head.
They strike without salt and vinegar. Their attacks do not affect me!
I have died once already. It was not so bad.
Oof. That was a fatal blow, or was it? *wink wink*
If I am to die, let me die! I cannot stand this torture!
Kill me or let me live! Do not torment me like this!
I am no fool. Your monstrous allies are easy to predict.
I have faced your kind before. You always act the same.
What? Too scared to fight a demon?
I am a wide man. Surely it is not that hard to hit me.
Hehe. Trying to box with a shadow? Hehe.
Blades and claws tainted in darkness? Mmm, my favorite.
You fool! Now I must search for a different soul to claim!
You are proud of your triumph, but you only hinder me and my quest.
Did I say you could strike? I did not, you impudent child.
You attack recklessly, no discipline. You should feel ashamed.
Look at these simple creatures, fighting their meaningless fight. Haha!
Ah, the affairs of mortal beings. How quaint.
They have proven their skill in combat, let us leave now before it is too late!
A warrior knows when to back down, and it would be best that we do!
Merely an act. I know that you conspire with these monstrosities.
A convincing performance to some, but not to me.
Careless, brutish. You strike poorly and will be slain as a result.
*shakes head* You are an embarrassment to us all.
Phew. If you landed that blow, I would have been furious.
Nice try, but that kill is meant for someone more worthy, such as me.
Perhaps they are demons? Perhaps they are my kin?
Pft. Should have aimed for the heart.
Again and again, I am always last to suffer!
No! My peers and companions, slaughtered before me once more!
Good. That makes things simple.
Taken by the fiends. A fitting fate for a betrayer.
How does it feel? Is it like a sword through the heart?
Pain puts hair on the chest. I could use some too!
Let this be a lesson to all of you. Do not be this fool.
You lack grace, finesse. You are injured because you do not listen.
Oh yum! Let me suck on the wound!
Oh how kind of you to spill blood for me! I was getting rather parched!
An act of mercy? No, an act of torment! They toy with us!
We have not been maimed. Now is an opportune time to withdraw!
You do not fool me. Your prancing only serves to entertain me.
You think I believe your little act? I know real bloodlust when I see it.
Aw, no drink for me? Now I am sad.
Hehehe. Did you like my smoke bomb?
I am immobilized with fear! I am to suffer the same death again!
No, stop! I WANT OUT!
Moving me into the center of your trap? I will not fall for it.
You seek to put me in a disadvantageous position, but I will not allow it.
Hnnngh! No! I want to FEEEEEEEEEEEEL!
Sorry, my legs are shaking with pain and pleasure.
Be patient, you imp, or I will beat the patience into you.
Disobey me, and the end of my blade will be your new teacher.
Stop, unless you seek to be possessed demonically!
Halt! I am the warden and you need to get back into your cell!
Foreign medicines and apparatus are things I will not accept.
Hmm. Probably poisoned. I will pass.
What is this? AID?! No thanks.
Pft. I do not need this. I am a hardy man!
Do not give things to a vagrant, it is unwise...
You give to a lesser man. It will only hinder you in the future...
Ew. Bring me a stillborn child and we will talk.
Is it the key to my heart?
Your strange eldritch ways unnerve me.
I prefer traditional methods, not your unorthodox ones.
What is the cost of this treatment? I will not pay a debt that I do not know.
No! Let my heart bleed!
I am already dead, inside and out. Do not try to change me.
Away with you. You mettle in my affairs and it irritates me!
Why mend a broken soul? Let what is dying, die...
It is not enough. It will never be enough...
Heal my mind or heal nothing at all, for it is all pointless...
What kind of trickery is this? Flesh does not just magically heal!
I would like some herbal tea before we begin please.
Do you have anything to cure my undead state?
Gifts never come without a cost, and I suspect the cost is my life!
I have no need of aid, especially not that of a stranger!
Trying to appeal to my interests? I am not so easily swayed!
I do not need your aid to relish in this pain.
No. Let me enjoy my eternal suffering.
I do not need comfort. I will be strong.
To bolster me, would be to bolster a crumbling fortress...
It will not restore my honor. It will not restore who I am...
You would only be dragged down with me...
Your attempts to bless me will only end in my agonizing demise.
No no! What you are doing is an exorcism ritual. That is not what we want!
Please. I do not need to be stamped with seals of power.
It is fine to build relations with your allies, but do not let it be a hindrance.
Even in this dreary abode, know that you are worth something.
In my homeland, many die forgotten and unmourned. This will not happen to you.
I bear many scars from many encounters. Time will heal all your wounds.
After every battle, you must care to your wounds so that you may fight on.
I have mastered many techniques, but the art of healing is the most essential.
We are all lost in our ways, but soon we will find our path.
Do not let your camaraderie become a burden. I speak from experience.
Despite my dispassionate and grim demeanor, I do care for your well-being.
Thoughts of inadequacy plague my mind. I am sure to fail!
How can I call myself a master when I have faltered so much!
It is pointless. We are all doomed to the void and that time is now!
I have never needed help with my duty, and that will not change today.
Their ways are strange, and likely malicious in purpose.
I am alone in this strange place. I can trust no one.
I have been pulling out my teeth and cutting up my gums. Want to see?
These horns are very sharp. They will work nicely as hooks for my skin!
Let way. I must heat my blade so that it will cut cleanly into my flesh!
I will not let talentless fools drag me down with them.
I cannot hope to teach these mongrels anything.
Useless. These ones are too stubborn to learn my teachings.
I was a mentor to others once. Not anymore.
I have been alone for a decade. I can manage without them.
There is no benefit in aiding these outsiders.
I would only make things worse...
My touch is that of a vagrant. It would be best if I kept to myself...
For my services, one of you will have to offer me your firstborn.
Is there a lamb we can slaughter? It is mandatory.
WE BE DEMONS. That is all.
Devious. To disguise malice as good will is most cowardly.
Your methods are unconventional. I will not be subject to them.
Your dirty foreign hands will not touch me!
I like it rough.
Let us spar. You will use a blade, I will use my fists!
Here. Carve the mark of shame into my back!
I will not allow your grimey hands anywhere near me.
There is nothing you can do. Do not try to act otherwise.
You think you can help? I will inform you that you are terribly mistaken.
Please. It is not wise to offer kindness to a disgrace like me...
I am ashamed. I cannot possibly accept a kindness in this state...
I am worth less than an outcast. Leave me...
Pfft. Good luck, I am incorporeal!
Hissssssssss!
Poison in the grain. A coward's weapon.
This meal is laced in toxins. I know of your deceit.
I must trim the fat so that only muscle remains!
Fasting is a common practice in my homeland. I will demonstrate!
I am below even the peasants of my social caste. I do not deserve food...
I have no need for mortal food. I am already dead!
Bread and water will not sate me. I must feed on the hearts of my enemies!
You were promised coin for my head. Instead, you will taste the edge of my blade!
You. You are the assassin and your life ends now!
A disgraceful display. You deserve the death that comes for you!
Pitiful. To die by my hand is the only honor I can offer you!
You. Your soul is mine!
I am the Reaper, and I decree that your time is done!
I come closer to my redemption...
Find peace in death, it is the only mercy I can bestow.
I was master of my art, and I still am.
I am Death.
One by one, they will fall.
Another added to the tally.
I have had steel pierce my beating heart, I am no mortal man.
I see how I will depart. Shamed and forgotten...
I must survive! I must redeem my name and fix my past mistakes!
Do what must be done. My sacrifice will restore the honor I have lost so long ago.

Garment

Believed to have been killed more than a decade ago, the Wraith is a man seeking to redeem his dishonored name by serving as his master’s personal assassin. Years of heartless slaughter has shaped him into a brutal and efficient killer. Using an intricate weapon made to counter his most common targets, the Wraith ensnares his victims in tightening chains before delivering a fatal blow with the bladed side of his wicked tool.

The Wraith travels to many faraway places to fulfill the grisly deeds given to him by his masters. As a result, he sacrifices the heavier armor commonly worn by warriors of his homeland in favor of lighter attire that also allows him the freedom of movement to use his deadly weapon. The blade and chain he wields is used with frightening flexibility. He can fling the bladed side to lacerate and execute his victims or use the blunt side as a flail to incapacitate his foes.

A menacing assassin with no emotions, the Wraith has learned to be most effective in the dark of the night. He is eerily silent despite his physique, and he uses this to his advantage. He can strike unseen from the shadows, besting even creatures that live entirely in blackness.
